column4: new to irc..is this the window that I can get some support for ubuntu remix on a eeepc notebook?
run: lsusb ,websearch for the 8 character hexid to find guides
the lsusb output will help you
install and run cheese. Do you see yourself?
then lsusb for you, also websearch: ubuntu netbook ,there is an official doc on some netbooks, yours maybelisted
i did run lsusb and a bunch of stuff listed but not really sure if the web cam is listed. i also googled but couldn't find anything for this model
try each id in turn, you can ignore the "linux hub" lines
r u saying google each id?
to find out what it is?
if that's your search tool of choice, sure
do i have any easier other options?
yes, one will be the cam, its attached to the usb bus
could websearch the model in conjunction with ubuntu to find guides maybe
the listing for the lsusb is jibirish
i'm referring to the builtin web cam and not an external webcam
thnx for that command..real handy..unfortunately it lists all the usb connections but no indication which one belongs to the webcam
thnx for all ur help but i don't think that we are going to have any luck with this..I will just have through xp back on there..thnx anyways..
